TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit JobScheduler extends Java.Lang.Object
Public MustInherit Class JobScheduler Inherits Object
public ref class JobScheduler abstract : Java::Lang::Object

Docs.summary: This is an API for scheduling various types of jobs against the framework that will be executed in your application's own process.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

public abstract int Enqueue (Android.App.Job.JobInfo job, Android.App.Job.JobWorkItem work);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 Enqueue(class Android.App.Job.JobInfo job, class Android.App.Job.JobWorkItem work) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function Enqueue (job As JobInfo, work As JobWorkItem) As Integer
public: abstract int Enqueue(Android::App::Job::JobInfo ^ job, Android::App::Job::JobWorkItem ^ work);
abstract member Enqueue : Android.App.Job.JobInfo * Android.App.Job.JobWorkItem -> int

Docs.param: The job you wish to enqueue work for. See android.app.job.JobInfo.Builder JobInfo.Builder for more detail on the sorts of jobs you can schedule.
New work to enqueue. This will be available later when the job starts running.
Docs.summary: Similar to #schedule, but allows you to enqueue work for a new or existing job.
Docs.returns: the result of the enqueue request.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Look up the description of a scheduled job.
Docs.returns: The JobInfo description of the given scheduled job, or null if the supplied job ID does not correspond to any job.

Docs.summary: Returned from #schedule(JobInfo) if a job wasn't scheduled successfully.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returned from #schedule(JobInfo) if this job has been successfully scheduled.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 Schedule(class Android.App.Job.JobInfo job) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function Schedule (job As JobInfo) As Integer

Docs.param: The job you wish scheduled. See android.app.job.JobInfo.Builder JobInfo.Builder for more detail on the sorts of jobs you can schedule.
Docs.summary: Schedule a job to be executed.
Docs.returns: the result of the schedule request.
